title: Gary Gulman
description:
Kevin sits down with comedian Gary Gulman to discuss his writing process, the hustle of being a comic in New York City, how touring with comics like Dane Cook and Robert Kelly led him to depression, and why he likes to use that depression and other experiences to influence his comedy. 

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (gary gulman, kevin hart)
